github_body:
General changes:
    * #139 Patrols and enemy packs can now be marked as 'teeming' and belonging to a specific faction (think Siege of Boralus).
    * #169 Added simple custom error pages. I'm looking to refine these further, but they're in Keystone.guru style now.
    * #185 Interally reworked the way affixes and affix groups are handled (a group is pretty much an affix set that you encounter every week). This now works with M+ Seasons, allowing for cleaner code and making it very easy to add new affixes/seasons. The only change for you is that the /affixes page will be more accurate going into the future, around the weeks where a new season is announced.
    *  As part of the above tickets, I've also fixed an issue that was introduced with the introduction of Teams where filtering Routes on the /routes page or in your profile, teams pages would no longer work. This has been corrected.
Map changes:
    * #188 Finishing deleting an object (or cancelling it) will no longer remove all raid markers from view. A refresh would bring them back, but that's not ideal of course.
    * #190 Demo routes now properly have group player specializations and attributes.
    * #191 Changing drawing color now properly changes the color of drawn Paths.
    * #192 Floor switcher is now initialized on the current floor, plus using it to change floors now always works.

v2.5.3 (2019/06/18)(https://keystone.guru/release/v2.5.3)
General changes:
    * #139 Patrols and enemy packs can now be marked as 'teeming' and belonging to a specific faction (think Siege of Boralus).
    * #169 Added simple custom error pages. I'm looking to refine these further, but they're in Keystone.guru style now.
    * #185 Interally reworked the way affixes and affix groups are handled (a group is pretty much an affix set that you encounter every week). This now works with M+ Seasons, allowing for cleaner code and making it very easy to add new affixes/seasons. The only change for you is that the /affixes page will be more accurate going into the future, around the weeks where a new season is announced.
    *  As part of the above tickets, I've also fixed an issue that was introduced with the introduction of Teams where filtering Routes on the /routes page or in your profile, teams pages would no longer work. This has been corrected.

Map changes:
    * #188 Finishing deleting an object (or cancelling it) will no longer remove all raid markers from view. A refresh would bring them back, but that's not ideal of course.
    * #190 Demo routes now properly have group player specializations and attributes.
    * #191 Changing drawing color now properly changes the color of drawn Paths.
    * #192 Floor switcher is now initialized on the current floor, plus using it to change floors now always works.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v2.5.3](https://keystone.guru/release/v2.5.3)

General changes:
* [\#139](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/139) Patrols and enemy packs can now be marked as 'teeming' and belonging to a specific faction (think Siege of Boralus).
* [\#169](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/169) Added simple custom error pages. I'm looking to refine these further, but they're in Keystone.guru style now.
* [\#185](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/185) Interally reworked the way affixes and affix groups are handled (a group is pretty much an affix set that you encounter every week). This now works with M+ Seasons, allowing for cleaner code and making it very easy to add new affixes/seasons. The only change for you is that the /affixes page will be more accurate going into the future, around the weeks where a new season is announced.
*  As part of the above tickets, I've also fixed an issue that was introduced with the introduction of Teams where filtering Routes on the /routes page or in your profile, teams pages would no longer work. This has been corrected.

Map changes:
* [\#188](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/188) Finishing deleting an object (or cancelling it) will no longer remove all raid markers from view. A refresh would bring them back, but that's not ideal of course.
* [\#190](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/190) Demo routes now properly have group player specializations and attributes.
* [\#191](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/191) Changing drawing color now properly changes the color of drawn Paths.
* [\#192](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/192) Floor switcher is now initialized on the current floor, plus using it to change floors now always works.

changes.change: Patrols and enemy packs can now be marked as 'teeming' and belonging to a specific faction (think Siege of Boralus).
Added simple custom error pages. I'm looking to refine these further, but they're in Keystone.guru style now.

Interally reworked the way affixes and affix groups are handled (a group is pretty much an affix set that you encounter every week). This now works with M+ Seasons, allowing for cleaner code and making it very easy to add new affixes/seasons. The only change for you is that the /affixes page will be more accurate going into the future, around the weeks where a new season is announced.

As part of the above tickets, I've also fixed an issue that was introduced with the introduction of Teams where filtering Routes on the /routes page or in your profile, teams pages would no longer work. This has been corrected.
Finishing deleting an object (or cancelling it) will no longer remove all raid markers from view. A refresh would bring them back, but that's not ideal of course.
Demo routes now properly have group player specializations and attributes.
Changing drawing color now properly changes the color of drawn Paths.
Floor switcher is now initialized on the current floor, plus using it to change floors now always works.
